signatureHint: Sign here with your mouse or finger
previewDisclaimer: Please review the contract carefully before signing. Your signature is legally binding.
acceptTermsLabel: I have read and understood the rental contract. I agree that my electronic signature is legally binding and has the same effect as a handwritten signature in accordance with Moldova Law No. 124/2022.
readyToSign: Ready to sign! Click the button below to complete your signature.
signContractDescription: Please review and sign the rental contract to proceed with your order.
ownerSigningDescription: Please review the contract and add your signature to confirm the rental agreement.
contractSignedDescription: The contract has been signed and sent to both parties.
waitingForOwner: Waiting for owner to sign the contract
missingContractData: Contract data is missing. Please try again.
failedToSign: Failed to sign the contract. Please try again.
idnpHint: Enter your Moldovan IDNP (13 digits starting with 2)
invalidIdnp: Invalid IDNP format. Must be 13 digits starting with 2.
previewLanguageHint: Preview the contract in different languages. The signed document will always be in Romanian.
